body.name: Mr IRONSTONE Nightstand with Charging Station, LED Night Stand with 2 Fabric Drawers, Bedside Table with USB Ports and Outlets, End Table for Bedroom, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Light up your home】This night stand is a true gem! With an LED light strip offering 20 colors and 22 modes, it brings vibrant energy to your home. Whether you're immersed in a book, or simply unwinding, the strip's 5 brightness levels ensure comfort and customization.

【Charge Your Life】Say goodbye to tangled cords and embrace the convenience of this incredible nightstand's charging station. With 2 AC outlets and 2 USB ports, you can effortlessly charge up your lamps, phones or tablets.

【Harmony Unveiled】Abundant storage beckons! Rest your cup and phone on the side table, while books find solace in open storage. Two big drawers, adorned with sleek metal handles, eagerly await bedside essentials.

【Long Time to Use】 With a sturdy metal frame, durable fabric drawers, and timeless wood grain, this beside table guarantees longevity. Assembly is a breeze with included tools and clear instructions. Enjoy its comforting presence in your space.
【What You Get】A well-made end table with an industrial design; easy-to-follow guidelines, friendly customer service, and lasting satisfaction with your family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional set of side tables
reviews.reviewText: Very functional side tables for bedside and especially for recliner. Great that my iPad and iPhone can both use the table’s charging function and be conveniently close to my recliner for easy access. I can put my keys, eye glasses, etc in the drawers. I got the set of two tables but I'm using them in different rooms. I have one in a guest bedroom as a bedside table. It's great there for a table lamp and for storage in the drawers, and the power strip is convenient for my guests for charging phones and iPads. The other is being used between two recliners in my den -- and again it's perfect for charging my mobile devices and storing things (like remote controls) in the drawers. The LED lights are also a nice touch to these tables, as they provide nice "underlighting" as a nightlight for both rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice side table!
reviews.reviewText: This was incredibly easy to assemble, so props to this product there. In person, it looks pretty much the same as it does in the listing photos. The one thing it doesn't mention or show, is that in order to use the LED underlight, you actually have to plug it into the USB port on the top of the unit. I really wish it connected either at the bottom or was wired with the main plug.You do get what you pay for with this, it is aluminum, cloth bins, and particle board, so it will be relatively fragile, but if you take good care of it, it's a nice piece that should hold up over time. I'm using mine as an end table in the living room so it's very convenient to have highly accessible plugs and a USB port and I do like its slick design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nightstands with a Modern Twist!
reviews.reviewText: Mr IRONSTONE's Nightstands have given our bedroom a contemporary and practical upgrade. The built-in charging station and LED light strips add a modern touch to the rustic brown design. The two drawers provide ample storage for bedtime essentials. It's not just a nightstand; it's a functional and stylish bedside companion. Upgrade your bedroom with this perfect blend of form and function!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Typically I will shy away from online furniture, but in this case I gave it a shot.The wood is particle board and the metal frame is brushed aluminum. That's about what I expected. The screws are sturdy and hold it all in place well without wobbles.Biggest plus here is that the instructions were very clear and well written. That's quite rare for online furniture, so kudos to the manufacturer.My only complaints are that I wish the LED strip could do soft white instead of the more abrasive colors it offers, and that it could somehow plug into the bottom of the power strip rather than needing to hook into the top.I will most likely keep the lights on the white/blue color.The storage is ample and I think it will last for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The assembly on this was pretty quick, came with all the necessary parts. Having a light and outlet in it are convenient features that most other nightstands lack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came with a remote to change the light color and is dimmable.
reviews.reviewText: Really like that all the tools needed came with it for assembly and a remote for the lights. Whole process to assemble took about 30mins for both with very easy to follow instructions. They look better then the photo and are very sturdy to use. The drawers are easy to pull in and out. Holding objects with no issues like bulging or sagging. Great addition to any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deceptively easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: I had zero problems putting this together, which is a huge anxiety relief. May buy more in the future. It’s really sturdy, nothing was bent or broken. There were no pieces missing. It looks exactly like it does in the preview photo.The wood looks amazing. The drawers do not feel cheap at all. It’s been a huge help cleaning up my cage room - and the light isn’t too bright for my pet rats!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: These were easy to assemble with clear instructions and are lightweight. I got them for the extra outlets and because they matched the rest of the furniture. It has an extra drawer fromy previous one which is always nice. The lights are separate with adhesive but they also have anchors to keep them in place which is good because I had one light strip fall off all the time and that gets irritating. My only complaint is that the outlet area is a bit of an eyesore but given the surface area, I suppose there aren't many options to conceal it. Overall, good nightstand.
